title: [Saewehna Jungle, Coast]
description: The shadows of night provide a dark background to the expanse of sand surrendering to the ocean's grasp as its foamy waves rush forth and retreat rhythmically on the shoreline.  A flock of pelicans rest upon a large boulder, their bodies still but for the occasional shift of feet as they huddle together in the moonlight.  Collections of seaweed cling to the debris cluttering the beach, and moonlight reflects from the dark surface of the ocean as the sound of waves crashing filters in on the evening breeze.

The vibrant plants and trees of the jungle provide an exotic background to the expanse of sand surrendering to the ocean's grasp as its foamy waves rush forth and retreat rhythmically on the shoreline.  A flock of pelicans gather upon a large boulder, only moving from their resting place to dive into the water and retrieve fish in their large gullets before returning to their perch.  Collections of seaweed cling to the debris cluttering the beach, and the cry of seagulls accompanies the crash of waves.
room.location: the environs of the Saewehna Lagoon
